ISSUE.TITLE: Passwords must be forced to change at least once every 90 days (compliance with PCI DSS requirements)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Requirement 8.2.4: Passwords must be forced to change at least once every 90 days Add two setting: 1. Enable password lifetime: true/false. Disabled by default. 2. Password lifetime (days). default: 90. But customers will be frustrated about changing their password every 90 days, and the potential for driving business away.... However to force admins and vendors to change their passwords every 90 day (and inhibit the use of previously used passwords) would be a great addition. Requirement 8.2 states 'non-consumer users and administrators' anyway. So add one more setting: 3. Password lifetime for users with admin access only. It'll indicate whether this option is required for users with "Access admin area" permission. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/38848/nopcommerce-380-roadmap-and-estimated-release-date-lets-discuss.aspx?p=5#159909 Also see related items - https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2010 and https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/786
